extendedInfo.description: No more call log after a phone call!Use this application to change the default action your phone does after a phone call. Simply select what do you want your phone to do after a phone call: - Do nothing - Go to phone Home screen - Go to phone Dialer - Vibrate - Show a toast message with the call duration. Outgoing call duration includes the ringing time.Configure separately for incoming and for outgoing calls.IMPORTANT NOTE: Sometimes Automatic-task killers kill the application and it cannot do its job. If you experience such problems, please uninstall the Automatic-task killer and configure OnCallEnd again.When Android upgrades from one version to another it is possible OnCallEnd to loose its configuration stored on the phone. It shows the configuration you made, but the application does not work. To fix it, you will have to change all settings to something else, save the configuration and then set them back to your values. I am sorry for this but it is out of control of the application.

reviews.title: Got a few bugs..
reviews.comment: On Razr Maxx, initial test seemed to work perfectly as advertised.  Worked after a reboot and did not appear in running app list.  Then,  turned on vibrate on call end (which works) & it no longer returns to home screen even, after disabling vibrate.  I hope developer can address the issues,  has great potential.
reviews.author: D. Manley

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: Would it be possible to add this feature? - When I make a call, I\'d like to see the Dialler appear by default along, instead of having to select it after dialing out, along with the Mute and Loudspeaker buttons. I always seem to be calling numbers that require numerical input. ie Press 1 to be annoyed, Press 2 to be ignored, Press 3 to forever Hold.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good simple app. Works well on my HTC Sensation. Also does more-direct your phone to Home etc also on call end.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be great
reviews.comment: It used to be work on my XPERIA arc. It\'s been back to home when on call end. But this moment it\'s only shake but not go to home as my setting. Fix it would be 5 starts and my must have app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not always work
reviews.comment: Sometimes it works, but more often it doesn\'t. I don\'t have a task killer. (htc one x) Fortunately this can easily be done with tasker.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on RMHD
reviews.comment: It works for the first call going out or coming in. After that doesn\'t go to home screen. Cleared cache and had to reenter what I wanted the app to do  after each call. A person shouldn\'t have to constantly clear the cache. Having this app would be pointless.
reviews.author: Lisa Gierszewski

reviews.comment: Seems to stop working for no apparent reason. Usually the next update fixes the issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not work on my Note 2 with security pattern
reviews.comment: I\'m using face recognition with security pattern and installed this application in order to not get the screen locked after a call - this is very inconvenient while driving and using navigation program such as Waze. But the application does not work as it is advertised and the screen does get locked after a call. Maybe, some special settings need to be changed somewhere?
reviews.author: Vladimir Abram

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: For those people who said that it use to work and not any more its because it forget the settings when you restart the phone just clear the data of the app and should work fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on ics
reviews.comment: Was very helpful but now doesn\'t do anything on moto razr running ics.  Any chance for an update?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 star app no doubt!
reviews.comment: It does a very fundamental thing that android forgot to add to the OS. When you end a call it\'s so annoying that the phone app still shows up when it should just disappear and show home screen instead. This app can be used for just that.
reviews.author: cyclic prefix

reviews.comment: Amazing its g8t without this all dialer is incomplete....must have.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better!
reviews.comment: Not bad, does sometimes fail to do what is supposed to do, ie go to home screen after a call. HTC One X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked once!
reviews.comment: Goes straight to screen lock after calls end. Initially it worked perfect and stopped the annoying and inconvenient screen lock after call. I get the menu still, simply nothing happens though!
reviews.author: Steve Robinson

reviews.title: Does NOT end annoying beep!
reviews.comment: someone posted and droid forums that this app will and that nasty annoying beep at the end of your phone calls it does not do this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It\'s really a great app thank u. Please add an  option to increase the call duration msg display time for example 10, 20 or 30 secs before msg disappears.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pls fix! The toast message shows duration of the ringing time. It only has to be time with connection. Anyway, great app, works every time. Legend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please fix this. Sometimes it works and sometimes not. Its great when it works which is a great safety feature in the car.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I only use it to display call duration after calls. works without fail each and every single time. highly recommended. - myTouch 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app! Got so sick of accidentally calling someone immediately after hanging up. This app fixed the problem!
reviews.author: A Google User
